ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: G ahead and make your fireworks :)  You don t have to be 16 to tinker, just to improve in it.  And since fireworks start out trivial anyway.... :) Tinik
ygData.messageBody:
G ahead and make your fireworks :) You don't have to be 16 to tinker, just
to improve in it. And since fireworks start out trivial anyway.... :)

Tinik Gutenkissed

-----Original Message-----
From: John Hancock [mailto:jwhancock34@...]
Sent: Friday, December 15, 2000 2:49 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak


Unlurking too; my Gnome Mage, Zap, is too young to
tinker, but I'm having fun and learning lots from this
list. Guess I'd better get busy and level the little
guy up, because he's itching to get started making
those fireworks. :)

Aloha,

John

--- M K <kayntwhyle@...> wrote:
